Candied Quipper: One of the cheapest quick snacks around. Quippers taste uncompromisingly bitter and have an awful crunch to them. They still aren't very good once dipped in boiling tree sap, but at least they are covered in candy...

Honeyed Siren's Tongue: The tongue of a siren produces the most wonderful sound when chewed, bards will often accompany instrumental performances with the chewing of a Siren's tongue in order to woo crowds even further. Mixing it with honey makes it slightly easier to chew, but cooking it causes it to lose these magical effects.

Water Elemental Juice: The fluid harvested from a living water elemental has been known to retain effervescent properties after being harvested due to residual magic power left over in the collected sample. Water elemental juice can be mixed with anything from potions to fruit juice to make a refreshing bubbly beverage. It is suggested to not drink the substance without dilution.

Pixie Salad: A tossed salad of finely chopped pixies will always produce the flavors of the colors of the rainbow. Each bite may taste like a different color, the first might be purple, the second may taste like red and so on and so forth. The older the salad is since the death of the pixies the closer the taste is to brown.
Trollbalaya: A jambalaya made from troll sausage, typically with a drizzle of boiled troll blood, topped with two Troll's eyes. (Trolls are surprisingly delicious)

Pulled Orc Sandwiches: Typically made from Orc shoulder or pectoral, the younger the orc the better. Requires 10 hours of cooking over old coals, best seasoned with an elven blend, two chopped onions, and copious salt and pepper.

Burritoes: Giant's toes are surprisingly rich in protein and healthy fats. Chop them, Sear them, cook two behir eggs in the left over grease, and create an excellent set of breakfast burritos. For a bit of added fun, they are best served on the toe nail.

Rib-hirs: Behir's are nasty buggers, but they're good for one thing: ribs. The longest rib cage you will find, gather up your town, or the local goliath tribe, and you'll make a killing off of these. Flay the scales and smoke at a low heat over hickory logs for 2 days, slowly rotating the ribs through. A nice baste of dwarven ale mixed with citrus, or a rub of an orcish spice blend will make this a meal to remember. Just keep in mind the smell will travel for miles, so you might attract a nearby Roc.

Roc Stock & Balor: While not actually made with Balor flesh, this demonic delicacy is as the name implies a stew made from Roc stock and any sort of demonic flesh. Due to the hellish nature of the flesh, the stew does not need any outside heat to work itself to a hearty temperature. Good for those in survivalist situations, assuming you can ignore the faint brimstone smell.

table.name: 1372 Roadside Encounter Ideas
table.caption: 1372 Roadside Encounter Ideas
rows: As the party passes beneath a large oak that has grown over the road, a branch swoops down and snatches the backpack from one of your groupThe tree proves vocally petulant when you attempt retrieval, tossing the bag from one branch to another.
Un giardino lussureggiante invita a mangiare verdure mature.
Un demone marcia in cima a una duna di sabbia a una mezza dozzina di passi da voi.
A King's Sheriff holds a colorful wanted posterHe carefully studies the party as they pass by.
One of the PCs spots a keyWhat's it for?

A young man and woman riding a horse bareback, ill-equipped for travel, make to pass by you in hasteIf questioned, they tell you they are lovers, fleeing a feud between their families who live in the village ahead of you.
Un sorridente commerciante di strada arrostisce ratti, rane e scoiattoli su bastoncini.
La strada attraversa una palude del canyon piena di gas tossici e infiammabili.
Una bambina sola blocca il ponte davanti a s√©, a meno che ogni viaggiatore non riesca a indovinare il suo indovinello.
A local noble stumbles out of woods and falls flat on face with a knife in his backHis guards round the bend and exclaim, "You, halt!"
Un bardo chiacchierone cammina accanto al gruppo.
Uno strano odore proviene dai cespugli.
The side of the road is lined with mausoleums to long dead mercantile familiesSome of them appear to have been broken into and doors hang free on rusted hinges.

The PCs come across the scene of a massacreA party of bullywugs lies slaughteredThe party hears crying and can find a young bullywug child"My parents, dead," she croaks"Killed by human soldiersHelp me get back to my tribe," she begs.
Una migrazione di 100 tartarughe si allontana dalla spiaggia quando ci si avvicina.

A roadside shrine to a local deity is the scene of a gruesome murderA woman's body, dressed in blood-stained white robes, lies in the middle of road as if dragged and dropped thereYou see bloody steps heading away from the corpse towards the woods.
Un gruppo di agricoltori ripara una recinzione.
Il cespuglio di foglie alla sinistra del sentiero inizia a brillare di una tonalit√† iridescente.
You stumble upon a small shrine dedicated to a deity of travelersIn the middle of the shrine you see a statuette with cupped hands, on which you can drop a coin for good fortune.
Gli indigeni accusano il partito di sacrilegio e profanazione, perch√© il loro antico luogo di sepoltura √® stato distrutto.
Una fila di anatroccoli segue la madre attraverso una strada trafficata.
A leather cord ties a well-groomed speckled horse to a nearby treeThe horse is fitted with an elegant but empty saddle.
You approach a caravan of camelsIt travels in same direction and the leader invites you to escort him as security.
La strada attraversa una citt√† in rovina e bruciata che sembra abbandonata.

A powerful storm forced you to take the only available refuge - an elderly couple's home, whose every room held numerous open cups of pungent hybiscalyptus root essenceThe heated cups over the stove further suffused the air with itNow, some days down the road from them and several washings later, you can still smell the sharp aroma upon your gear and clothes.
You notice three small jars sitting in the middle of the roadOne is openYou also see a bloated body lying with its back towards youAs you approach, you hear loud buzzing from the bushes nearby.
A scraggly man sits at the crossroadsHe offers dreams at a bargain priceTo show he is being literal, he takes out a bottle containing a purple mist swirling inside
Un corteo funebre si snoda lungo la strada, con i chierici che implorano tutti coloro che incontrano di fare donazioni alla fede.
Un uomo vestito sbarra la strada e chiede un pedaggio, vantando il suo grande potere di mago.
The party falls in with a group traveling to a religious shrineEventually, the party becomes aware these are actually members of an opposing religion who plan to desecrate the shrine.
Un menestrello nudo chiede un passaggio alla locanda pi√π vicina, dove ha lasciato i suoi vestiti, e dei soldi per pagare i vostri problemi.
The PCs travel though an area suffering from a heat waveThe mid-day sun is exhausting and takes its toll on the characters.
Un cavallo senza cavaliere passa al galoppo davanti al gruppo, con la sella segnata da artigli.
All'improvviso gli effetti meteorologici finiscono e rimane solo un silenzioso crepuscolo in cui i venti sono calmi.
The carriage is overturned and all the passengers are deadOr are they undead?
Il gruppo si imbatte in un semplice anello d'acciaio che fa passare chi lo indossa all'allineamento opposto.

The cemetery below the road is haunted by the tortured spirits of the murderedOn the full moon they rise up as skeletal aspirations and wraiths and terrorize travellers, pulling them into the catacombs below.
Un piccolo gruppo di statue inginocchiate e realistiche, congelate nella paura o nella supplica.
The road leads through a tunnelHalfway through, the party finds a major wall and roof collapse revealing a large passage running adjacent to the road, with flickering lights visible further in.

A pack of five feral puppies eats a kobold corpse in a crossroads areaThey are less than a year old and they are a terrier breed meant for huntingThe leader of the pack is the best-fed and is not afraid to posture at the party if they get too close to the pack's latest meal.
The bridge is guarded by shady-looking characters who claim to be asistance.
A burly man sits next to a hay-wagon with a broken wheelHe waves in despair when he notices you.
Una coppia di grifoni cacciati dalla loro casa di montagna da un guardiano.

Alongside the road, a man calling himself The Amazing Steve asks the party if they want to see a performance of his trained petsThe slightest affirmative answer causes Steve to give a whistle, and a huge swarm of ravenous locusts suddenly manifests.
Un uomo inciampa sulla strada, chiaramente ferito, seguito da una ventina di corvi.
Una carovana ferma sulla strada blocca il traffico mentre i conducenti danno da mangiare agli animali e riempiono le borracce in un ruscello.
Un tratto di strada insolitamente verdeggiante e ricoperto di vegetazione, con banditi avvolti da liane che implorano di essere lasciati liberi.
Eclissi parziale di sole.
Uno strano segno inciso su un albero vicino a voi sembra fresco.
La torre davanti a noi crolla sul fianco della collina e inonda la strada di enormi pietre.
Un frate grasso passa di corsa davanti ai PC borbottando: "Non √® giusto".
La strada √® attraversata da molte tracce di animali, come se una mandria di bestie avesse attraversato la strada nello stesso momento.
Un mago malvagio legato a un palo, con il corpo ancora fumante.
Un venditore ambulante vende giocattoli animati.
Sentito prima di essere visto, un bambino che piange siede da solo in mezzo alla strada.
Una nebbia incandescente avvolge la strada.
Passa un cavaliere straniero solitario.
Un terremoto fa cadere il gruppo e un ampio tratto di strada in una voragine.
Uno strano cane o un altro animale vi segue a distanza.

I successivi 100 metri di strada sono coperti da erba appena cresciuta.
Un gigante attende in agguato dietro una recente frana, scagliando le pietre cadute contro chiunque si rifiuti di pagare il suo pedaggio.
A plaintive bleating draws the party's attention to small creatures in their pathThe party's wilderness expert declares it to be a host of baby chimeras.
Come sono arrivati qui? Vestiti e indumenti femminili sono sparsi tra i cespugli lungo la strada.
A group of pilgrims resting beside the road, all dressed in simple robesThey look exhaustedMany are barefoot and have bloody feet.
Una piaga di locuste giganti blu e gialle inizia ad attraversare la strada dentro e intorno alla festa.
Il Mago Pazzo, un tempo brillante mago, ora infastidisce il gruppo con gli sproloqui incoerenti di un uomo reso folle da un incantesimo di invisibilit√† mal riuscito.

You decide to camp not far from the roadside, but while setting up, a ghost rises up and tries to possess you(If successful, the PC runs off into the night, leading the party to a cave-in that claimed the ghosts' life, hoping the party will complete his long forgotten quest and allow his spirit to restIf the possession fails, he beckons the party to followIf they do not, he flies into a rage and attacks.)
I profughi fuggono da una lettiga di peste in arrivo.
Su un sentiero nel deserto, appare un'oasi con diversi animali morti di recente che giacciono intorno alla pozza d'acqua.
Un venditore ambulante desidera commerciare con i PC viaggiatori, con molta insistenza.
Tutto il cibo della zona (bacche, ecc.) √® stato avvelenato o √® marcio.
Nobili fuorilegge tipo Robin Hood chiedono l'aiuto del gruppo per recuperare uno dei loro catturati da un malvagio signore.
A small group of men take target practice with crossbowsThe target in question is a pumpkin patch besides a rundown cottage
Un mago senza scrupoli ha animato questo tratto di strada in modo da sballottare i viaggiatori con violente scosse e da farli cadere con i detriti della superficie stradale.
Da una collina che domina una strada stretta e tortuosa, i PC intravedono due carri che corrono l'uno verso l'altro.
Un nano ubriaco barcolla e sfida tutti a un incontro di lotta.
A human skeleton is pinned to a tree by an arrowA backpack lies nearby.
Overcast day, fog blanketed groundA moneylender cries in his wagon and the local farmers weep from the famineThis is a bleak and dreary place
Un carro in fuga, trainato da una coppia di rinoceronti, corre lungo la strada.
Vicino alla strada si trova un veicolo fatiscente invaso da flora commestibile.
Ambush: small monstrous humanoidsHidden threat: soft ground with spikes, tunnels, underbrush.
A group of travellers or pilgrims approachAs they pass, one glances up at a PC and yells "YOU!"
Un goblin, in fiamme, corre strillando verso il gruppo.
So treacherous is the road, one of your mounts has thrown a shoe that cannot be foundThere was no smith in the village you left behind.
Un guerriero goblin si proclama "Re dei Ladri". Porta con s√© un pugnale ed √® in grado di tenere testa ai PC in qualsiasi battaglia.

The road cuts through a mountainside by means of a tunnelPartway through, an underground river has broken through to cut across the path, its strong current challenging your progress with roaring rapids in the darkness.
Una roccia con una strana runa luminosa si trova lungo la strada.
Lepers ring their bells and chantThey approach you: "Please milord, spare some coin?"
Dondolando da un albero all'altro, una banda di scimmie dispettose assedia la festa e cerca di impadronirsi di una serie di oggetti luccicanti.

A noble, disguised as a filthy beggar, tests the party's compassion and generosityIf they pass whatever standard he's set, then he becomes a source of various quests that require personal sacrifice to accomplish.

A dead horse, in full tack, lies dead in a ditchThe saddle bags are full of adventuring equipment, a few gems, a gilded goblet, and a map to what appears to be a treasure troveCursory examination shows signs of a struggle and drag marks leading further off the road.
Il gruppo vede un gruppo che si sbarazza di un altro lasciando dietro di s√© morti e moribondi.
Un gas verde nocivo e bilioso ricopre la strada davanti a noi.

An older gentleman hobbles along, apparently injuredIf asked, he admits to being caught unawares and attacked by brigands and mumbles he should have known betterHe asks the party for an escort until the next crossroadsDuring the trip (or during the conversation if the party refuse to help) he pick pockets as many of the party as he can for as much as he can.
Un giovane cane o un'altra creatura decide di seguire giocosamente la festa.
Un albero con la corteccia rosicchiata o strappata alla base.

A thin, elderly man hands out copper pieces to every child that walks byTurns out he is the KingA small gesture to promote his good standing with the peoplePeople who have started to think the old king is growing soft and cold hearted.
A tinker with an over-encumbered mule looks worried the PCs might be evilThe mule stumbles and starts to tip.

A mangy dog eating the carcass of a unrecognizable animal run over by a cart is the center of a swarm of flies and a foul stenchThe dog may try to defend its prize, or follow the party, stinking all the while.
Una cassa malconcia giace di lato.
Vi imbattete nel corpo di un drago morto, la cui forma enorme crea un ostacolo invalicabile.
Un viaggiatore bloccato sul ciglio della strada √® un artista della truffa.
Uno scheletro gigante si arrampica in cima a una rupe.
A loyal mount stands wounded in the road, protecting its unmoving rider who lays supine upon a copious amount of bloodLowering its head, it snorts as your party draws near.
Quando l'antico eremita accovacciato sul ciglio della strada vede la festa, salta in piedi e grida: "La profezia, la profezia, si √® avverata!". Poi corre nel campo di grano alle sue spalle.
Un PC calcia una pietra che ha uno strano segno.
The wizard's tower is a stopover for manyA small town has grown around it as a result.
As you trudge forward, a loud cracking sound brings you shortA light flashes brilliantly, then before you appear humanoid figures of no species you've ever encountered.
Walking towards you barefoot is an old monkHe appears to carry only a water skin and staffHe only speaks a regional language.
A circus is set up alongside the roadA barker on the roadside cajoles you to "come inside and see what wonders it holds."
The road crests a hill, and spread out before the group is a stunning, sweeping vista of the land beyondA painter sits nearby, capturing the scene, and asks the group to pose for his foreground.
Un grosso pezzo di muratura ornata (e forse straniera) blocca la strada, con segni di recente caduta dal cielo.
Il cartello accanto alla strada ha l'illustrazione di un mostro e recita "Violent Wild Beast Crossing".
A dirt dwarf crawls out from the local dump sprawling across the roadThe smell is putrid.
Il gruppo trova un gruppo di grotte poco profonde disposte secondo un preciso schema geometrico.
The road is rigged with an obvious and clumsily/hastily made trapThe PCs can hear drunken giggling from the undergrowth.

A woman on the road yells for help, saying bandits robbed her and her husband and left her husband for deadShe leads the PCs to her husband who is close to death and needs immediate medical attentionIf he dies then the party has gained a hanger-on they have to take to at least the next town, if not all the way homeIf he doesn't die they have to find a way to travel to the next town with a dying man.
Vicino alla strada si trova un tumulo delle dimensioni di una tomba, evidentemente di recente scavo, segnato alla testa da un paletto verticale.
L'aria diventa improvvisamente fredda o calda.
A rowboat sits on the side of the roadThere is no river or stream nearby.
After a recent storm, a small rivulet crosses the roadAll around it lay the bodies of dead birds and small rodents.

The characters are presented with an alternate route to their destinationWhich is safer or faster? And which is more comfortable and easier to travel? What's the cost for either route? How do the PCs get this information? Can they trust the source?
Un cappio vuoto pende da un grosso ramo in alto.
Le mosche ronzano intorno a una scarpa che contiene un piede davanti a voi.
Un chierico errante prega gli eroi di recuperare una reliquia per loro.
A nobleman's retinue is travelling up behind the PCsExpect the guards to be rash and impolite.
A pair of rangers fine-tunes their skills piercing a melon 600 paces awayHalf a dozen arrows already riddle the fruit.
A potion lies on the roadBeside it is a wooden sign with words etched in charcoalThe sign reads "drink me."
I PC scoprono che la taverna in cui avevano programmato di alloggiare √® sotto attacco da parte di un gruppo armato di persone in uniforme.
Una colonia di lebbrosi migra sulla stessa strada percorsa dai PC.
A prison work-gang and their guards are rebuilding part of the roadThe convicts use the arrival of the party as an opportunity for escape.
Le nuvole grigie si squarciano per lasciare spazio a un fascio di luce brillante, che vi affascina mentre siete sulla strada.
Davanti a voi c'√® un cartello stradale che indica la vostra provenienza.
A group of guardsmen hang wanted posters on treesOne face looks familiar to a PC.
From an old roadside shrine to an unknown god the group hears cryingA naked newborn baby lies upon the altar in a beam of sunlight, with no sign of anyone else about.
La strada da percorrere si biforca in sei direzioni.
Un enorme nido √® caduto da un albero sul ciglio della strada e le uova, dall'aspetto strano, sembrano sul punto di schiudersi.
Gravity seems to have been defied when you come across an upside down bridgeIs it just an optical illusion, did the builders read the plan upside down or is there more to this than first appears?
The PCs spot a small cave up a nearby hillIs it a shelter or a lair?
Il messaggero del Re ha bisogno di un cavallo fresco.
A rift to another dimension appears in the middle of the roadIt might take the form of a rainbow end, a dark and crackling portal or a simple hole in the ground.
Un nano cade dal cielo.
A wind elemental likes to cause havoc along this roadSeveral travelers have warned you and authorities of the threat, yet the officials only answer with, "Whatever blows your skirt up."
Una fila di teste mozzate su punte e un cartello di avvertimento che recita: "Dis Rode Belong Garg".
Uccelli giganti volano via da un albero morto, colpito da un fulmine.
Un gruppo di stranieri/non umani in abiti che il gruppo non riconosce ferma i PC e fa domande urgenti in una lingua che nessuno capisce.
Un grande drago volteggia sopra le nostre teste come un falco in cerca di prede.
Un Tyrannosaurus rex insegue un triceratopo.
A fallen cart has pinned its driver underneathThe cargo of the cart may also involve contraband goods.
Una famiglia di elfi sta cercando di attraversare illegalmente il confine.
La strada passa sotto uno strano arco di pietra.
Un grande albero si abbatte improvvisamente davanti a voi.
Una strana sostanza oleosa fuoriesce da una parete rocciosa, formando pozzanghere che ricoprono la strada.
Un piccolissimo kobold/goblin/umanoide non realmente minaccioso che indossa un vecchio tappeto come mantello balza sul sentiero e chiede il tributo di Re della Strada.

You approach gypsy wagons in a circleAt first you hear people talking and children playingThe closer you get, you start to hear whispersWhen very close, you are greeted with complete silence and you see no one around.
La strada √® piena di traffico, tutto in direzione opposta a quella dei PC.
Un halfling impazzito, affamato all'inverosimile, attacca i PC e strappa i loro zaini con i denti in cerca di cibo.
Ambush: archers behind a tree across the road just around a bend in the roadClose quarter forces hide in bushes.
Cavalcatura mostruosa cavalcata da uno gnomo.
La strada √® chiusa per neve, indipendentemente dalla stagione.
Il cacciatore di taglie rintraccia il suo obiettivo.

table.name: Item Properties
table.caption: Item Properties
rows: Attached
Attached to gauntlet or armor, leaving hand free.
Bonded
Weapon only usable by owner, cannot be removed from person without consent.
Breaking
Can be used to target and break objects at no disadvantage.
Concealable
Can be hidden from view.
Concussive
Creates a burst of sound or light on impact to deafen/blind/temporarily stun.
Deadly
Each upgrade increase attack die (up to d10).
Elemental: Air
Has properties related to air (e.gcan subtly manipulate winds, harness electricity).
Elemental: Earth
Has properties related to earth (e.gbenefits to mining).
Elemental: Fire
Has properties related to fire (e.gproduces heat/light, can cause burning).
Elemental: Metal
Has properties related to metal (e.gbenefits to blacksmithing).
Elemental: Water
Has properties related to water (e.gcan extinguish fires).
Elemental: Wood
Has properties related to wood/plants (e.gbenefits to gardening, nature traversal).
Flexible
Whip or whip-like; Range (close), AoE (close), Stunning (binding), Unwieldy (-2 AB).
Focused Area
AoE can be focused in a line, cone, etcEach upgrade allows a different option.
Focused Damage
AoE can be focused to only target specific creatures or objectsEach upgrade allows greater flexibility.
Impacting
Each upgrade increases range of knockback (close, short, medium, long).
Magical
Has general magical properties.
Masterwork
+1 attack or damage bonus. (Doubles Base Mundane value)
Penetrating
Ignore armorWith second upgrade, ignore shieldsAC otherwise still applies.
Poisonous
Can cause poisoning.
Ranged
Each upgrade increases range starting at short (short, medium, long).
Reach
Can be used at close range or thrown at no disadvantage.
Rending
Serration or other features cause sustained wounds and mutilation.
Siege
Can be used to break open structures.
Silenced
The weapon produces little to no sound on projection or impact.
Spellbreaking
Can silence spells/spellcasters on successful attack.
Stunning
Can be used non-lethally to incapacitate at no disadvantage.
Suppressing
Creates an obstacle to those in weapon range-2 AB to anyone in range.
Unique Appearance
May be a well known item or associated with a well-known person or faction.

table.name: Alchemy Results
table.caption: Alchemical Mishaps
rows: {@item You are able to speak 1 additional language for 5 days}
{@item You can jump 4 times as high as normal and falling damage you take is quartered for 24 hours}
{@item You grow one size category larger for 5 days}
{@item You grow feathers all over your body that last for 10 days}
{@item You grow a controllable prehensile tail that lasts for 10 days}
{@item You grow scales all over your body that last for 10 days}
{@item You gain an erection lasting more than 4 hours}
{@item You grow a long ginger beard that lasts for 10 days}
{@item You shed bright light in a 30 foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 foot radius beyond that for 10 days}
{@item The potion also contains a water elemental that will appear in an area adjacent to you after the next physical activity you engage in}
{@item You grow a third eye in your forehead that grants + 2 to perception checks that rely on sight that lasts for 10 days}
{@item Your sweat becomes sticky and you can climb along vertical surfaces and ceilings using your hands for 24 hours}
{@item The potion is a Shit Scrying potion in addition to its expected outcome}
{@item You regain your lowest expended spell slot}
{@item You erupt into flames, taking 1d6 fire damage per round until extinguished}
{@item You can see any creature that is invisible for 10 minutes}
{@item Your age changes by 1d20 years, odd is younger, even is older}
{@item Every hair on your body falls out}
{@item You pee fire for the next 24 hours}
{@item The potion also contains a fire elemental that will appear in an area adjacent to you after you next fall asleep}
{@item You shrink one size category smaller for 10 days}
{@item The potion also induces level 1 barbarian rage when consumed for 1 minute}
{@item You and anything you are wearing or carrying becomes invisible for 1 minute}
{@item Your skin turns a vibrant color, roll 1d8 to determine, rerolling 8's}
{@item You grow an additional pair of arms on your torso for 24 hours (DM's control)}
{@item The potion is also extremely alcoholic in addition to its normal effects}
{@item You gain the ability to telepathically communicate with any creature you can see within 30 feet of you}
{@item You gain resistance to fire damage and can cast the 1st level spell Burning Hands (DC 15) at will, without using a spell slot or any components for 1 hour}
{@item You gain resistance to lightning and thunder damage and can cast the 1st level spell Thunderwave (DC 15) at will, without using a spell slot or any components for 1 hour}
{@item You gain resistance to cold damage and can cast the 1st level spell Ice Knife (DC 15) at will, without using a spell slot or any components for 1 hour}
{@item You feel sharper and see 1 second into the future and you gain proficiency in Acrobatics for 10 days}
{@item You smell sweet like flowers or honey and you gain proficiency in Animal Handling for 10 days}
{@item You feel an attunement to the weave and you gain proficiency in Arcana for 10 days}
{@item Your muscles ripple with strength and you gain proficiency in Athletics for 10 days}
{@item Your tongue turns to silver and you gain proficiency in Deception for 10 days}
{@item You gain the experience of many lives before and you gain proficiency in History for 10 days}
{@item You gain the ability to tell when someone is lying and you gain proficiency in Insight for 10 days}
{@item You acquire a resting bitch face and you gain proficiency in Intimidation for 10 days}
{@item Any clothing or armor you wear turns into a long waterproof trench coat with loafers and you appear to be wearing a bowlers cap and you gain proficiency in Investigation for 10 days}
{@item Whenever you speak you begin with the phrase "What is the nature of your medical emergency?" and you gain proficiency in Medicine for 10 days}
{@item You acquire long, greasy and unkempt hair and beard, smell like the dankest nugs, and gain proficiency in Nature for 10 days}
{@item Your eyes double in size and you gain proficiency in Perception for 10 days}
{@item Your voice becomes that of an angel and you can't help but speak in rhymes or song and you gain proficiency in Performance for 10 days}
{@item Your tongue turns to gold and you gain proficiency in Persuasion for 10 days}
{@item You are enshrined in a soft golden light and you gain proficiency in Religion for 10 days}
{@item You grow an extra finger on each hand and you gain proficiency in Sleight of Hand for 10 days}
{@item Your footsteps make no sound and you gain proficiency in Stealth for 10 days}
{@item You always know which way is North as well as the direction of the nearest source of fresh water and you gain proficiency in Survival for 10 days}
{@item The potion causes your skin to harden and you gain resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage for 1 hour}
{@item The potion causes you to levitate 6 inches off the ground for 1 hour}
